DataElement.preferredName: Screening Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction Outcome Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of method used for the screening measurement of left ventricular ejection fraction result.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Screening Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A systematic examination or assessment._A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Screening Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A systematic examination or assessment.:A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber.

Concepts.longName: Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
Concepts.definition: A measure of how much blood the left ventricle of the heart pumps out with each contraction. With each beat, a normal heart ejects about one-half to two-thirds of the blood in its left chamber.

Property.preferredDefinition: A phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/30/2021: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredName: Screening Measurement of Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The type of screening measurement of left ventricular ejection fraction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

Concepts.definition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A multi-gated acquisition (MUGA) scan and a form of radionuclide imaging that provides a comprehensive look at blood flow and the function of the lower chambers of the heart ventricles.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic test used to evaluate the pumping function of the heart's ventricles. A radioactive tracer is injected into a vein and a gamma camera detects the radiation released by the tracer, with image acquisition triggered (gated) at different points of the cardiac cycle.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
